mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_good_comment ( customer_id, base_id, remark, comment_status, create_date, operate_date ) VALUES ( #{customerId}, #{goodId}, #{remark}, 1, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.remark, t2.portrait as 'backImg', t2.uuid AS 'customerId', t2.`name` AS 'customerName', t1.create_date FROM t_good_comment t1 LEFT JOIN t_customer t2 ON t1.customer_id = t2.uuid WHERE t1.base_id = #{goodId} AND t1.deleted = '0' ORDER BY t1.create_date DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE t_good_comment SET deleted = '1' WHERE id = #{id}
